Name: Princess Pride
Ingredients: 60 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Vic's improved version of the Princess Mary's Pride cocktail .
History: Adapted from a recipe by Victor J. Bergeron and published in his 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide Revised .
Nutrition: One serving of Princess Pride contains 216 calories
